title: mdCockpit 2
description:
Microdrones UAV users will be thankful for this handy app designed for Android tablets.

mdCockpit lets you quickly and easily plan, monitor, adjust, and analyze flights for Microdrones Surveying Equipment.

Perfect for use on a job site, mdCockpit includes convenient features that help you tackle projects and deal with unexpected changes in the day's schedule.
descriptionHTML:
Microdrones UAV users will be thankful for this handy app designed for Android tablets.
